us.phonetic: /v. kəmˈbaɪn; n. ˈkɑmbaɪn/, (v. kəm bīn′ for 1, 2, 6, kom′bīn for 3, 7; n. kom′bīn, kəm bīn′ for 8, 9, kom′bīn for 10)

example.eg: First, combine the ingredients with a whisk.
example.egtrans: 首先用打蛋器将食材搅拌混合。

example.eg: Julia combined the eggs with some milk.
example.egtrans: 茱莉亚将那些鸡蛋与一些牛奶混合在一起。

example.eg: Combine the sum from this column with the sum from that column to get the total.
example.egtrans: 将这一列的数字加那一列的数字，即可得到总数。

example.eg: Combining style with class, Audrey Hepburn's fashion is timeless.
example.egtrans: 风格与品位相结合，奥黛丽赫本的时尚是永恒的。

example.eg: When the two chemicals combine, an explosion occurs.
example.egtrans: 当这两种化学物质结合在一起时，就会发生爆炸。

example.eg: Nitrogen combines with hydrogen to produce ammonia.
example.egtrans: 氮气与氢气结合产生氨气。

example.eg: Poverty and physical disability combined to make life challenging for Wendy.
example.egtrans: 贫穷与残疾协力让温蒂的生活充满挑战。

us.phonetic: /v. kəmˈbaɪn; n. ˈkɑmbaɪn/, (v. kəm bīn′ for 1, 2, 6, kom′bīn for 3, 7; n. kom′bīn, kəm bīn′ for 8, 9, kom′bīn for 10)

example.eg: You can often see combines in the fields in September.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 联合公司, 联合集团

us.phonetic: /v. kəmˈbaɪn; n. ˈkɑmbaɪn/, (v. kəm bīn′ for 1, 2, 6, kom′bīn for 3, 7; n. kom′bīn, kəm bīn′ for 8, 9, kom′bīn for 10)

example.eg: Opposition to the government and anger at the police combined to bring about the riots.
example.egtrans: 对政府的不满，以及对警察的愤怒，导致了暴乱的发生。
